name: Flareborne
description:
Flareborne

An Undead Adventurer, In cursed land fighting monsters.
Join Him in his quest to fulfil his contract with the death.

Controls:

Movement: WASD / ARROWS KEY

Dash: SPACE BAR

JUMP: J Key, Z Key

Attack: K key, X key

Credits
